import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import './adminDepartmentDataActions.css' const AdminRegisterSignUp = () => { const [admin, setAdmin] = useState({ name: '', nim: '', department: '', batch: '', email: '', password: '' }) const {name, nim, department, batch, email, password} = admin const navigate = useNavigate() const onChange = (e) => { setAdmin((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/register', { name, nim, department, batch, email, password }) console.log({status: 'ok'}) navigate('/admin') } catch (error) { console.log({message: error.message, error:'Duplicate Email'}) } } return (

MASUK

) } export default AdminRegisterSignUp
